content: and the same hook size to give your pumpkin a more interesting colour 7 for a thicker more gnarly stem try doubling up your green yarn and working the same steps as before but with a 4mm / 4 5mm hook instead copyright © 2025 bilby & ben 11 instagram @bilbyandben the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of bilby & ben the pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not edit sell or distribute this pattern or use it as a base to pass off as your own design thank you i really hope you enjoyed making these munchkin squash i love seeing all of your makes so don t forget to tag me @bilbyandben on insta or to use the tags #mycrochetkitchen and #mycrochetkitchenpumpkin in your posts much love laura-maria bilby & ben copyright © 2025 bilby & ben 12 instagram @bilbyandben the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of bilby & ben the pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not edit sell or distribute this pattern or use it as a base to pass off as your own design
